pages.text: $(li)The Witch Hut is an exiled place where $(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) live peacefully.$(br)$(li)The main house can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l), but there are also other variants that can appear throughout the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/witch_pupil)Witch Pupil$(/l) inside of this place.
